I wanted someone of Mike Pence 's caliber representing the Republican Party in the race for the White House. "My hope is that he will continue to stay in a leadership position, whether running for governor or staying where he's at in Congress. I just want him representing Indiana in some capacity, Hollis added. Ben Young of Richmond thinks Mike Pence made the right decision. "My hope is that he runs for governor. I think it's rather fortuitous that it's open at this particular time

Bloomberg BusinessWeek Feb. 10, Stephen Elop and Microsoft CEO Steve Ballmer have been engaged in talks about porting Windows Phone 7 onto Nokia devices. Stephen Elop apparently had similar conversations with Google CEO Eric Schmidt , according to the source, but those discussions are unlike to lead to an alliance. Should a Nokia-Microsoft alliance develop over Windows Phone 7, it could prove beneficial to both parties. While Eric Schmidt travels the world meeting with business partners, government officials and potential takeover targets, Page says he will be making most of the big decisions as he tries to rekindle the soul and passion of a start-up. Sergey Brin will concentrate on developing new products. He's worth$ 15 billion, but Page remains something of a rebel who has always had a disdain for corporate protocol.

"In the choice between seeking national office and serving Indiana in some capacity, we choose Indiana," Mike Pence , R-Columbus, said of himself and wife Karen in a letter being sent to supporters. We will not seek the Republican nomination for president in 2012.... he telegraphed his interest in the governorship by focusing on Indiana in his letter, saying his "calling is closer to home." "Egypt recognises and appreciates the care and effort undertaken by the government of Germany to preserve and display the painted limestone bust of Queen Nefertiti," Zahi Hawass said in a statement. But he asked that this unique treasure be returned to the possession of its rightful owners, the Egyptian people. Article: Egypt asks Berlin to return Nefertiti bust... Google Inc. has many different businesses and the issue that we have been getting into is there's too many ways[ in] which these businesses can be slowed down, Eric Schmidt said.
